findings.title: Set Balance function is using mint/burn function in DividendPayingToken
findings.description: The Set Balance function is utilizing the mint/burn functionality within the DividendPayingToken contract, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can lock user funds by Setting tradingIsEnabled to false
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to lock user funds by setting the 'tradingIsEnabled' variable to false, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: maxBuyTransactionAmount to 0
findings.description: Deployer can lock user funds by setting maxBuyTransactionAmount to 0

findings.title: maxSellTransactionAmount to 0
findings.description: Setting maxSellTransactionAmount to 0 can potentially cause issues with transaction processing and user funds management.

findings.title: maxWalletToken set to 0
findings.description: Setting maxWalletToken to 0 can potentially cause issues with token management and user funds.
